remoteClasses.name: VideoSampler
remoteClasses.doc: VideoSampler interface. This type of :rom:cls:`Filter` samples at a configured rate frames from its video source and delivers it using gRPC to a configured destination.

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the filter belongs

params.name: imageDeliveryMethod
params.doc: Method used for image delivery, currently only gRPC supported

params.name: height
params.doc: Height of the sampled images, 0 to keep original

params.name: width
params.doc: Width of the sampled images, 0 to keep original

params.name: endpointUrl
params.doc: gRPC endpoint where images wil be delivered.Set to empty string or invalir endpoint url to not send sampled imaged

properties.name: delivered
properties.doc: Flag indicating if the image coudl be delivered or not

events.name: SampleImageDelivered
events.doc: Notifies that a sample image has been delivered

complexTypes.name: ImageEncoding
complexTypes.doc: Enumerated representing different image encodings that may be used for image delivery

complexTypes.name: ImageDelivery
complexTypes.doc: Enumerated representing different image delivery methods
